授業目的:
Each student is expected to work on a supervisor-approved project that challenges them to learn about new digital technologies and use those technologies to positively impact digital society. Although the main theme of the seminar is technology-related, not all students are expected to become engineers. This year, technologies include:
1) Generative AI (text, image, audio, video) such as ChatGPT, Bert, Claude, Llama, Huggingface.
2) Computer Graphics (3D Modeling, Game Design & Development),
3) Development of smartphone applications (games, utilities, etc.),
4) Game platform (Wii, PS3, Xbox 360, Wii U, PS4, Xbox 720),
5) 3D character animation (Blender, Maya, etc.),
6) Social networking apps (Facebook, Mixi, etc.),
到達目標:
Students will:
1) Work on advisor-directed research projects
2) Learn useful research techniques based on the scientific method
3) Work on groups of 2 or more to develop their research themes more efficiently
4) Write academic papers using standard writing tools
5) Programming skills
6) Surveying skills
授業の概要・背景: This is a practical class that teaches how to select research themes for your senior thesis and graduation thesis. In the first year, students will learn mainly about selecting a senior thesis research topic, organizing the topic, selecting team members for team projects, making presentations, and planning research goals and success indicators. In the second year, students are expected to realize a graduation thesis research project as a follow-up to the first year. In the first year, students are required to submit written work, but in the second year, students will either submit a graduation thesis or submit the actual results of their research as digital data. For example, games, music tracks, animations, web services, etc.
